channel.title: TIP: iOS Menus Provide Quick Access to Commands and Settings
channel.description:
Although it's not obvious in the interface, many buttons in Drafts have iOS menus attached. Tap and hold on buttons for options (or secondary-click on iPad with attached trackpad/mouse).
https://youtu.be/8zsGW8wy9kY
Some general quick access options you might find useful:
* The "Draft" button at the top left has quick access to copying to the clipboard the contents, title, and links for the current draft, as well as ways to change syntax and get info. * The tag button can quick assign recent tags, or toggle flags * The `Aa` editor settings buttons can change themes. * The actions button at the top right lets you select and run actions without opening the action list.
